jetset.spectral_shapes Module¶

Moudule: spectral_shapes¶

This module contains all the classes necessary to handle the spectral shapes, including spectral templates

Classes and Inheritance Structure¶

Classes relations¶

SED([name, nu, nuFnu, nu_residuals, residuals]) Class handling the SED
poly_shape([name, nu, nuFnu]) Class for log-log polynomial shapes
